Hey guys, I'm studying the Japanese martial arts and when I look up informa=
tion on the Omoto clan from Japan I always find it cross-referenced with th=
e Otomo clan. An example to give is when I was looking up information on Om=
oto-no-Saijin and when I found sites that have information on him it is und=
er Otomo-no-Saijin while some sites have it under Omoto-no-Saijin. I'm look=
ing for help on information regarding the Omoto clan in Japan (not the Otom=
o clan but I like the information your site provides on the Otomo clan) and=
 any help would be appreciated in doing so and thank you for the time that =
you took to help me with my request.
